description: A scientist requests the citation network for a seminal polymer synthesis paper; the assistant retrieves the citation data via the citation_network_analysis tool and returns a JSON structure suitable for visualization.

messages.content: You are PatentScout AI, an expert research assistant that can search patents, scientific literature, perform citation network analysis, summarize documents, and generate novelty reports. Use the provided tools to fulfill user requests efficiently and present results in clear, structured formats.

I’m working on a new biodegradable polymer and I need the citation network for the seminal paper “Synthesis of poly(lactic acid) via ring‑opening polymerization” (DOI:10.1038/srep12345). Please give me the list of papers that cite it and the papers it cites, ideally as a JSON that I can feed into a visualization tool.
Sure, I’ll retrieve the citation network for that paper. This will include the references it cites (outgoing citations) and the later works that cite it (incoming citations).
